loadByName.sql: select * from user_admin where username like #{username}

update.sql: update user_admin set username=#{username}, password=#{password} where id=#{id}

disable.sql: update user_admin set status=#{status} where id=#{id}

page.sql: select * from user_admin <%if({{username}}) return 'where username like #{username}'%> <%if({{sort}}) return 'order by ${sort} ${order}'%> <%if({{pageSize}}) return 'limit #{pageOffset}, #{pageSize}'%>
